<script data-cfasync="false" type="text/javascript">
  var freestar = freestar || {};
  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};
  freestar.config.disabledProducts = {"sideWall":true};
  freestar.config.enabled_slots = [];
  freestar.initCallback = function () {
    (freestar.config.enabled_slots.length === 0) ? freestar.initCallbackCalled = false : freestar.newAdSlots(freestar.config.enabled_slots);
  };

    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>
</div>
        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 itemprop="name" class="text-center medium-text-left">Closeness Pleasing <small style='white-space: nowrap'>for women and men</small></h1></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6 text-center"><div class="grid-x"><div class="cell small-12"><img itemprop="image" width="375" height="500" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/375x500.87878.jpg" alt="Closeness Pleasing for women and men"/></div></div></div><div class="cell small-6 text-center"><p itemprop="brand" <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="87878" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="87878" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.20</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="30">30</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="10"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Closeness</b> by <b>Pleasing</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Closeness</b> was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Carrot, Orris and Bamboo; base notes are Papyrus, Musk, Salt and Cashmeran. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>A long warm day lingers, held in place, then swept away by a gentle breeze. Evening descends, a door opens. A brush, a touch, a whispered yes. Skin pressed against skin, soft, matte, glowing underneath the light of the moon, while still, deep water reflects swift-moving clouds from above.</p>

<p>ForCloseness, Australian pink pepper extract, cardamom and clean sheets accord make up the woody musk scents top note trio, rounded out by orris butter, carrot seed France and bamboo. Salted musk, Indian papyrus and cashmere woods complete the scent in a sensual flurry.</p>

<p>Top:Australian pink pepper extract, cardamom EO, clean sheets accord.</p>

<p>Mid:Orris butter, carrot seed France, bamboo.</p>

<p>Dry:Indian papyrus, cashmere woods, salted musk.</p>

<p>As with each Pleasing fragrance,Closenesshas been made in collaboration with esteemed fragrance house Robertet, the world leader in sustainable, natural raw materials. Shared value programs, consciously harvested materials, locally sourced ingredients through partnerships with co-op programs that support small communities and environmentally efficient production methods underscore each fragrance from Pleasing.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.es/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Espaol</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.fr/parfum/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Franais</a>,  <a target="_blank" rel="noopener">Italiano</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.ru/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"></a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.pl/perfumy/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Polski</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com.br/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html" </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="87878"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 4.375rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86862915010152; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.63.jpg" style="width: 3.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cardamom-63.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cardamom</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.275.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Carrot-275.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Carrot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96720444101136; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 3.75rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.42.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bamboo-42.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bamboo</div></div></div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2323908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323908" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vixxiimcmlxxxvii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1074199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vixxiimcmlxxxvii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Santal-Vanille-67204.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67204.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Vanille"title="Santal Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074199">vixxiimcmlxxxvii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried to use up my travel so I could be done with it but ended up buying a full bottle. Realized how much dryer and saltier this is than Sonic Flower and You, something I really like a lot, and facets I hadnt picked up on during the test wear. I guess I should have given it a proper chance! Id even venture as far as to say its a more masculine leaning You. So yes, its still very much similar to the others, but it is unique, as well. No, you dont need all three. But I think if you get in your moods like I do, it can be nice to have options. And for my current mood, this is my favorite of the three.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2323908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2323908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vighletends"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1626417"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1626417.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vighletends" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1626417">vighletends</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This DOES smell like glossier you. The only difference, which for some could be a dealbreaker, is that the pepper is not as significant upon initial spray. When you first spray it, the carrot is very strong, making it like a sweet version of glossier you (not sweet in a gourmand way, but in a watery way). That sweetness does dissipate a lot but definitely sticks around in a small way, where You has almost none and is a lot drier and sharper. <br />
The dry down is nearly indistinguishable and in my opinion the carrot makes it smell even more musky and your skin but better. This is still at its core a musky peppery woody clean fragrance in the same exact way. I would say Closeness is a colder fragrance and You is a warmer fragrance, if that makes sense. Ive smelled a lot of dupes on a desperate hunt to find a longer lasting You and usually, all of the differences are a dealbreaker for me no matter how small. So when I say this is the most similar, I mean it. The closest out there is Zaras and its discontinued with even worse lasting power.  And the longevity is soooo much better here. You lasts all of 5 seconds on me.<br />
<br />
TLDR: If you want a true replacement that lasts a long time and are okay with it being a tad sweeter and less dry upon initial spray, I think youll find that this is a perfect alternative.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2242675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2242675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Out of the 3 Pleasing perfumes, this one was a flop. Pink pepper and orris is a really weird blend I would never want to wear on my skin. Two really funky notes that don't belong together. I like pink pepper only in certain blends. This is worse than Glossier You, since that one contains iris which is different from orris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2198384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2198384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177064" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saboon32"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381875.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saboon32" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Fragrance-01-Taunt-52312.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52312.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fragrance 01 Taunt"title="Fragrance 01 Taunt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381875">saboon32</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Did not like this on initial spray but as it dries it gets better. It smells like "You" a tiny bit but this is more salty and peppery to me.<br />
<br />
Disclaimer: I know nothing lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2177064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2177064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165757" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="minatozaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727293.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="minatozaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/AXE/Aqua-Bergamot-95402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Bergamot"title="Aqua Bergamot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727293">minatozaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells exactly like glossier you but with a slight salty edge to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2165757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2165757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2164792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tine182"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2105287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tine182" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105287">tine182</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really intrigued by these and bit the bullet to buy the travel size set. I didnt know, going in? that this one in particular was a basic exact match for Glossier You, but upon first sniff I knew! The GREAT news for me is I loved the OG You, but in recent years the new reformulation goes completely sour on me. This scent captures all of what I loved about You years ago but is a bit more complex somehow. It smells less synthetic somehow? I really love it and now want the full size immediately!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2164792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2164792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164674" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vixxiimcmlxxxvii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1074199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vixxiimcmlxxxvii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Santal-Vanille-67204.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67204.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Vanille"title="Santal Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074199">vixxiimcmlxxxvii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 17:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Purchased due to supposed similarity to Glossier You and Sonic Flowerone of my favorite scent profiles the last couple of years. They just came out with travel sizes and I figured Id grab one<br />
<br />
Similarity to Glossier You is beyooooond an understatement. Theyre identical, except for a moment in the opening which has a slightlyalmostlaundry-esquething. Which I think youd only detect if you really KNOW You and Sonic Flower. This isnt nearly as vegetal as SF, much much more closely resembles You. So, still my fave of the three is SF, and always will be, I have a feeling.<br />
<br />
I cant say Im disappointed: I knew this was coming. I just really hoped that supposed cardamom note would pull through. Alas, its undetectable. One thing I can say is Im glad I discovered the brand. I know nothing of Harry Styles (except he recently cut his hair) and I dont care (except I prefer the short hair) but I like the brand for what they have to offer outside of fragrance!<br />
<br />
I should add, though identical in scent, this lasts longer and smells stronger than You.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2164674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2164674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="not_jena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1936245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="not_jena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936245">not_jena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect mix between Glossier You and Phlur Father Figure. Buy if you want to smell like high quality luxury paper!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2148247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2148247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062695" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Harley522"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1673493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Harley522" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673493">Harley522</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was very curious about these Harry Styles perfumes. His brand is really hyped on TikTok and all over Internet. I was doing some research particularly about the perfumes. They are made from collaboration between Robertet perfumer Jerome Epinette with Harry Styles. Harry supposed had a hand in the creative process of a scent. And that might be true, because I came across rumours on Instagram by Harry fans who personally meet him in the past, saying that Closeness is really similar to the scent he wore. <br />
Pleasing pop-up stores are also scented in cloud of Closeness.<br />
So I blindly ordered that perfume, not just because of association with Harry but because all the people on TikTok saying that this was the sweetest among trio. And I was also intrigued by clean sheets, bamboo and salt notes in it. Some compared that perfume with pre-reformulated Glossier You. I never smelled that perfume, so I really didnt know what to expect.<br />
Im glad that its now mine, because that was a  at first spritz.<br />
Its so attractive and sexy to me. Its smells really like a dream guy. But its not overly masculine, it is gentle, skin scent. With time becomes more powdery but not overly. Something airy and watery is also in it. Its like the feminine smell collide with masculine pheromones. No harsh, chemical elements here and its not boring. I never smelled any perfume in my life, that smelled like that. <br />
This would smell so good on your boyfriend. And if you are overly girly with sweet taste, you can layer this perfume with something super feminine for an interesting twist.<br />
I also agree with previous reviewer. Theres something in that perfume that evokes lakes and forests in United States. It has that American feeling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2062695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2062695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057027" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057027" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aliceblur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aliceblur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057027ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057027" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942135">Aliceblur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 05:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has become a part of me. I feel calm and at home when Im wearing it. I also feel like something is missing when I dont smell it on me. Reminds me of the deep lake atvgrandfathers cabin, the forest and also my little wellsmelling Yorkie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2057027"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2057027#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>

It smells like "You" a tiny bit but this is more salty and peppery to me.<br />
<br />
Disclaimer: I know nothing lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2177064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2177064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="not_jena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1936245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="not_jena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936245">not_jena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect mix between Glossier You and Phlur Father Figure. Buy if you want to smell like high quality luxury paper!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2148247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2148247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tine182"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2105287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tine182" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105287">tine182</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really intrigued by these and bit the bullet to buy the travel size set. I didnt know, going in? that this one in particular was a basic exact match for Glossier You, but upon first sniff I knew! The GREAT news for me is I loved the OG You, but in recent years the new reformulation goes completely sour on me. This scent captures all of what I loved about You years ago but is a bit more complex somehow. It smells less synthetic somehow? I really love it and now want the full size immediately!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2164792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2164792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165757" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="minatozaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727293.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="minatozaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/AXE/Aqua-Bergamot-95402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Bergamot"title="Aqua Bergamot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727293">minatozaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells exactly like glossier you but with a slight salty edge to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87878"comment_id="2165757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Closeness-87878.html?ccid=2165757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="87878" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

    </div>
            <div style="margin-left: -0.65rem" id="anchormehere45646">
            <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_3 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_3" v-pre>
</div>
        </div>
                    <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>

                 data-sticky
                 style="margin-left: -0.65rem; margin-top: 2rem;"
                 data-top-anchor="anchormehere45646:bottom"

            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">18.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Maison-Martin-Margiela.html" class="en2inter">Maison Martin Margiela</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">19.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Givenchy.html" class="en2inter">Givenchy</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">20.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montale.html" class="en2inter">Montale</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">21.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Carolina-Herrera.html" class="en2inter">Carolina Herrera</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">22.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
